== Control elements ==

Features like LEDs and internal settings are exported via ALSA's control interface. Try

<code>$ amixer controls</code>

to see which features are offered.

== Input elements ==

Buttons, knobs and pedals are exported as Linux input interfaces. See appropriate website to learn how to use them.
